comment.author: 17264356@N00
comment._content: The pictures are labeled in one language in script (Spanish?) and then another (German) in type. These don't appear to be postage stamps, and do appear to be thumbtacked to something. The pushpins can be seen in each corner. -- Seen on your photo stream. (?)

comment._content: Otto Edler von Graeve (top line of writing on sticker) was a proponent of dowsing. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Otto_Edler_von_Graeve
